name: Wasteland
summary: The game is set in a futuristic, post-apocalyptic America destroyed by nuclear holocaust generations before.Developers originally made the game for the Apple II and it was ported to the Commodore 64 and MS-DOS. It was re-released for Microsoft Windows, OS X, and Linux in 2013 via Steam and GOG.com, and in 2014 via Desura.
